poly 347 139 425 139 420 0 343 0 Area code 605
poly 348 139 429 139 420 243 352 243 Area code 308
poly 155 243 154 274 418 272 418 244 Area code 970
poly 77 192 1 192 1 273 152 273 154 244 72 244 Area code 435
poly 0 45 11 64 14 69 33 62 40 58 53 59 66 58 72 49 82 63 84 36 343 35 343 0 1 0 Area code 406
poly 0 44 10 63 15 68 32 65 39 59 52 59 64 59 72 49 81 59 78 192 0 192 Area code 208
Area code 307 is an area code for the U.S. State of Wyoming. It is the only area code for Wyoming. It was one of the first area codes because it was made in 1947.
